"Congratulations on completing the level.\n Did you know that the number 7 is a lucky number? There are 7 days in a week, 7 continents, 7 colors of the rainbow, 7 musical notes and much more. Also, the number 7 is the favorite number of most people in the world."

"Congratulations on completing the level.\n Many crocodiles swallow rocks. But not because the stones are edible for them. The stones help them sink into the water faster and stay on the bottom."
